item.title: How One Wikipedia Editor Unraveled the ‘Single Largest Self-Promotion Operation’ in the Site's History
item.description: A decade-long effort to boost one man’s reputation was undone in a matter of weeks.

item.title: How One Wikipedia Editor Unraveled the ‘Single Largest Self-Promotion Operation’ in the Site's History
item.description: A decade-long effort to boost one man’s reputation was undone in a matter of weeks.

item.title: Dedicated volunteer exposes “single largest self-promotion operation in Wikipedia’s history”
item.description: Ten years of work to boost one man’s reputation.

item.title: Wikipedia loses UK Safety Act challenge, worries it will have to verify user IDs
item.description: Judge tossed claim but said UK must not “significantly impede” Wikipedia operations.
